solution_line_template: First find his current travel time {total_distance} miles / {current_rate} miles per hour = <<{total_distance}/{current_rate}={current_travel_time}>>{current_travel_time} hours.
{current_travel_time} hours - {time_decrease} hours = <<{current_travel_time}-{time_decrease}={desired_travel_time}>>{desired_travel_time} hours desired travel time
{new_rate} miles per hour - {current_rate} miles per hour = <<{new_rate}-{current_rate}={speed_increase}>>{speed_increase} miles per hour faster
